local_intent: Ensure the green_glass_bottle is visible or scan, detect it, move to a pregrasp 0.05 m above it, then verify arrival.
assumptions: IsAt(target) indicates arrival at the commanded pregrasp over the target.
ScanForTarget will make the bottle visible if initially not seen.
coherence_with_global: Matches the early segment of GLOBAL_BT: visibility check/scan -> DetectObject -> MoveAbove (offset_z=0.05, timeout=2000) -> verify with IsAt. Parameters mirror the global tree.
